item.description: Authentication to Azure using PowerShell # Hmm, something. How to authenticate to Azure, apparently. Service Principal # $Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ` -ArgumentList $ClientId, ($ClientPassWord | ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText) Connect-AzAccount -ServicePrincipal -TenantId $TenantId -Credential $Credential
